name: @govuk-react/constants

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:es
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src -x .js,jsx,.ts,.tsx -d es --source-maps --config-file ../../babel.config.js

author: Alasdair McLeay
description: govuk-react: A port of the govuk-frontend components for React using styled-components.
